attributes.action: All scheduled U.K. local elections for May 2025 must go ahead as planned.
attributes.additional_details: The postponement, delaying and/or cancelling of any election, be it local, regional or national only sows the seeds of a loss of faith in our democracy.
attributes.background: It has been proposed that some local elections scheduled for May 2025 are to be postponed due to local authority reorganisation. As a cornerstone of democracy, the ballot box serves as a peaceful opportunity for voters to voice their opinions. Postponement of this opportunity is bad for democracy.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
